name: Toadeo and Koopiet
description:
This was an attempt at creating a very basic story with some simple game mechanics and very few moving parts. Made in a week back in 2010.

 I held off putting up some older projects like this for a long time because of their obvious flaws.

Looking back much later now, I think it's honestly a cute game that showcases an intersting kind of game concept. Obviously with the Nintendo assets this concept can't really be pushed further without a different graphical direction. Yet the storytelling that the game builds off of kind of relies on the players familiarity with Romeo & Juliet and Mario.

To play:
Arrow keys to move
Z key to jump
the C eventually does something.
